short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copies the style of other buttons, and offers a few configuration options for sizes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This app injects a React applet that allows you to copy the style of other elements.  By clicking on the buttons on a bank or company's websites, users will be able to copy the style of the targeted buttons and apply them to a yes® button.  These buttons can then be downloaded for presentation decks and advertising paraphernalia.
